subject: HISTORY

text: What were the chief effects of the Crusades on medieval Europe?

subject: HISTORY

text: Explain the system of government known as “Tudor despotism,” and show how far it was suited to the times in which Henry VII and Henry VIII lived, or explain why the reign of Elizabeth I is described as “the spacious times of great Elizabeth.”

subject: HISTORY
text: Describe with the aid of a sketch-map, the part played by Gustavus Adolphus in the Thirty Years War, and explain why the Peace of Westphalia is considered a landmark in European History, or do you think that the Civil War ([1642]-[1648]) was fought chiefly on religious or on constitutional issues?
